alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 29 at 8:48AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Maryland and eastern and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
